DataElement.preferredDefinition: the event began date related to the protocol-defined patient/participant follow-up, the process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study treatment has been discontinued.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the protocol-defined patient/participant follow-up, the process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study treatment has been discontinued.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered.:The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed.

Concepts.definition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.

The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event began.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/23/17 jk transferred context, cap first letter in def, and added CSI, registration status per Round 5 finalization task.

DataElement.changeDescription: ISO 11179 compliance. Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014
